item.title: Report E-2024050351
item.description:
Report E-2024050351

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-21T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-09
  • City: ELKTON
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ESTES EXPRESS LINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 6500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Clean Harbors was dispatched to the site. Upon the contractorâ€™s arrival, personnel observed that the released material impacted a 4ft-by-4ft area of the trailer floor and estimated that one (1) gallon of material was released due to load shift damaging one (1) plastic jug. Clean Harbors personnel deployed a neutralizer to the impacted area and gathered the spent material. The recovered material was containerized into one (1) 55-gallon poly drum. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location prior to the contractor demobilization. The generated waste will remain onsite for the ESTES DGRM team to coordinate disposal.

item.title: Report X-2024050737
item.description:
Report X-2024050737

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-21T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-07
  • City: GAITHERSBURG
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH AND RATTLED LIKE LOOSE DRY ICE WAS IN THE BOX. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY TWO POUNDS OF DRY ICE PELLETS COOLING AMMONIUM SOLUTION. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. OUTER BOX IS A ULINE INSULATED SHIPPER PREPRINTED RUSH, PERISHABLE, AND HAS A YELLOW FREEZE UPON ARRIVAL STICKER APPLIED. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
